DOC.brief_summary: Development Staccato Prochlorperazine treatment migraine headache .
DOC.brief_title: Staccato Prochlorperazine Patients With Migraine Headache
DOC.criteria: Subjects migraine headache without aura ( diagnosis accord International Headache Society guideline ) least 6 month , pain free least 48 hour since end last migraine attack , pain rating Moderate Severe prior dose . Subjects take migraine pain medication within 48 hour randomization , history allergy intolerance phenothiazine relate drug , consider investigator , reason , unsuitable candidate receiving prochlorperazine , unable use inhalation device , must exclude .
